about_the_game:
About the Game


SlapBR is a simplistic, horror battle royale. You can compete with friends, create and join rooms, and become terrified as you hide-slap-block your way to victory.

Key Feature


FPS: SlapBR is like that of an FPS where your weapons are your hands. The only two options you have are to slap and block.

3D Audio & JumpScares: Audio in SlapBR is immersive and will scare you. This includes flashlight clicks, punches, death effects, block effects, and canons each time someone is killed, not to mention the jumpscares when in proximity of another player.

Battle Royale Quickness: The game operates as a fast paced BR. Each round lasts only 300 seconds until the large borders close in on the forest. Once the game is other, hop right back in for another round.

Player Discord


Join the SlapBR Player Discord:

name: SlapBR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard & Mouse
